sentences.english: With the countless torches lit, with the silent sea of faces and the unbarred heads.
sentences.chinese: 无数火炬燃起，无数脸孔和致哀者汇集的沉默海洋。

sentences.english: A confluent small-pox had in all directions flowed over his face .
sentences.chinese: 天花打四面八方汇合拢来，布满了他整个脸孔。

sentences.english: Don Juan contorted his face again into a devilish grin and said that the young man declared that he wanted to have the gourds.
sentences.chinese: 唐望扭曲成邪恶的脸孔说，年轻人宣布他决定要葫芦。

sentences.english: And see that figure of Christ, that face of Christ on the gate?
sentences.chinese: 看见那尊基督像门上的基督脸孔吗？

sentences.english: However, with her new face I can't see her going any further.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我看不出带着她的新脸孔她还能走多远。

sentences.english: Mrs Pipchin's grey eye scanned his thoughtful face.
sentences.chinese: 皮普钦太太的灰色眼睛细看着他的若有所思的脸孔。

sentences.english: I know an inory-faced and silvery-haired man is unlikely an angel.
sentences.chinese: 我知道有着玉色脸孔银白发丝的男人并不一定是天使。

sentences.english: The choleric face distorts in a look of puzzlement.
sentences.chinese: 那张暴躁的脸孔蹙了起来，显得有些迷惑。

sentences.english: Hard wind and wizen his face.
sentences.chinese: 强风与酷寒使他的脸孔皱缩了。

sentences.english: A huge quartzite block had an engraving of a pharaoh.
sentences.chinese: 一块巨大的石灰岩上雕刻着法老的脸孔。

sentences.english: His lean limbs and white face were his only language .
sentences.chinese: 削瘦的四肢和白色的脸孔是他仅有的语言。

sentences.english: The manager had a fierce face, and the customers also lacked pleasant voices.
sentences.chinese: 掌柜是一副凶脸孔，主顾也没有好声气。

sentences.english: She is typically shown with the face of a woman and the ears and horns of a cow.
sentences.chinese: 她通常是拥有女性的脸孔及牛耳和牛角。
无名的墙上挂着无框的脸孔。

sentences.english: Staring on your face reflected in a pool of water?
sentences.chinese: 直视水池中倒映出的自己的脸孔？

sentences.english: Hao Ran went to school with a sullen face every day.
sentences.chinese: 浩然每天都带着冷冰冰的脸孔到新学校上课。

definition: self-respect of old person/face/thick-skinned (i.e. impervious to criticism)/brazen
